text:
The Director of the OCC shall have the authority to subpoena witnesses, compel their attendance and testimony, administer oaths and affirmations, take evidence and require by subpoena the production of books, papers, records or other items relevant to investigations under the jurisdiction of the OCC. This subpoena power shall not extend to departments, officers or employees of the City who are obligated to provide prompt and full cooperation to the OCC pursuant to Charter Section 
4.127. 
(Added by Ord. 244-03, File No. 031401, App. 10/17/2003)
